mapper.select: select u.user_id,u.user_name,password,account_type,head_img,max_auth_level,user_group ,sex,age,xy_code,xy_name,zy_code,zy_name,user_unit,title,nj,bj from sys_user u left join ( select user_id,min(ur.role_id) max_auth_level,wm_concat(r.role_name) user_group from sys_user_role ur left join sys_role r on r.role_id = ur.role_id group by user_id ) ur on ur.user_id = u.user_id where u.user_id = #{userId}
select ROLE_NAME as "title", ROLE_ID as "value" from sys_role where ROLE_ID != 1
select role_id from sys_user_role where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert:
insert all
into sys_user_role(user_id,role_id) values (#{userId},#{rid})
select * from dual
mapper.select: SELECT m.* from sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm on rm.role_id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu m on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id WHERE user_id = #{userId} order by pid,m.menu_id

SELECT sum(CASE when m.menu_name = '提交' then 1 else 0 end) "isAuthSubmit" -- 是否授权提交 ,sum(CASE when m.menu_name = '审核' then 1 else 0 end) "isAuthShenhe" -- 是否授权审核 from sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu m on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id WHERE m.pid = #{menuId} and ur.user_id = #{userId}
